price: sa Araw na iihip sa tambuli saka pupunta kayo na pulu-pulutong.
arabic: يَوۡمَ يُنفَخُ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَتَأۡتُونَ أَفۡوَاجٗا

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yawma yunfakhu fī al-ṣūri fatatūna afwājan
